means: 受到腐蚀，生黑腐病，溃烂

word_mean: (坏疽性)溃疡：主要是口和唇的溃疡
马蹄癌：马蹄上角质生成膜的疾病，始于马蹄叉，向足底和侧壁蔓延。其特点为角质分泌细胞功能丧失，而排出一种浆液性渗出物代替正常的角质
(犬、猫的)外耳道炎：犬和猫外耳表面的炎症，又称cancrum

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a tumour): from Old French chancre, from Latin cancer 'crab' (see cancer)

entry.def: A canker is something evil that spreads and affects things or people.
Canker is a disease which affects the wood of shrubs and trees, making the outer layer come away to expose the inside of the stem.

example.ex: In gardens, cankers are most prominent on apples and pear trees.
example.tran: 花园里,苹果树和梨树患枯枝病最明显。
